title: Recollections of a Visit to Glasgow with the British Archæological Associations, August 27th to September 5th, 1888. With notes
author: Lambert, George
snippet: The Company drove in omnibuses from the CityChambers to Langside. On arriving there they walked upto the flagstaff in the Queen's Park, where Mr. A. M. Scottgave a graphic description of the battle of Langside.
